name: Eurelectric aisbl
membership: Eurelectric is a member of FAIB, EEF, MEDELEC, Alliance for European Competitive Industries.
goal:
The mission of Eurelectric, the European electricity industry association, is to contribute to the development and competitiveness of the electricity industry and to promote the role of electricity in the advancement of society.

As a centre of strategic expertise, Eurelectric undertakes in-depth and specialised research into the market place, technologies and legislation to assist its Members in formulating common solutions and in conducting the necessary actions.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Clean Energy for all Europeans
Energy Union
Climate change
Energy efficiency
Renewables
E-mobility
Internal energy market
